abstract: Explosion at San Pablito fireworks market in Tultepec, Mexico, kills at least 27 people and injures 70.

headline.print_headline: Dozens Die in Blast at Fireworks Market in Mexico
headline.main: Explosion at Fireworks Market in Mexico Kills Dozens

snippet: The blast at the open-air San Pablito Market in Tultepec, on the outskirts of Mexico City, left at least 27 dead....
lead_paragraph: The blast at the open-air San Pablito Market in Tultepec, on the outskirts of Mexico City, left at least 27 dead.
